content: ज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [जि-जन्-जु-वा ड] {@--1@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Born from or in, produced or caused by, descended from, growing in, living or being at or in &c.; अत्रिनेत्रज, कुलज, जलज, क्षत्रियज, अंडज, उद्भिज &c. {@--2@} Prepared from, made of. {@--3@} Belonging to, connected with, peculiar to. {@--4@} Swift. {@--5@} Victorious, conquering. --जः {@--1@} A father. {@--2@} Production, birth. {@--3@} Poison. {@--4@} An imp or goblin. {@--5@} A conqueror. {@--6@} Lustre. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--9@} Enjoyment. {@--10@} Speed, swiftness. {@--11@} (In prosody) One of the eight syllabic feet (गण).
